INFO_TITLE: This facility is available at no extra cost.
NO_VIRTUAL_ACCOUNT: There are no virtual accounts to display.
ADD_10_ACCOUNT_TEXT: Add up to 10 virtual account numbers at a time. To add more, please follow the same process.
MIN_MAX_LIMIT_HINT: Min: 5 characters, Max: 24 characters, cannot be 11 characters

ERROR_LABELS.MIN_LENGTH_VIOLATION: Virtual account number should atleast be 5 characters
ERROR_LABELS.LENGTH_NOT_ALLOWED: Virtual account number cannot be 11 characters
ERROR_LABELS.DUPLICATE_NOT_ALLOWED: The virtual account number already exists. Please choose another account number
ERROR_LABELS.EMPTY_VIRTUAL_ACCOUNTS: Atleast 1 virtual account should be added to proceed
ERROR_LABELS.INVALID_EMAIL: Please enter a valid email address.
ERROR_LABELS.INVALID_MOBILE_NUMBER: Please enter a valid mobile number.

DELETE_VIRTUAL_ACCOUNT_TITLE: Are you sure you want to delete this virtual account?
